channel.title: CVE Feed for ORing -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ORing -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-3203|2024-08-03T01:00:10.865Z -- oring -- iap-420%28%2B%29
item.description: On ORing net IAP-420(+) with FW version 2.0m a telnet server is enabled by default and cannot permanently be disabled. You can connect to the device via LAN or WiFi with hardcoded credentials and get an administrative shell. These credentials are reset to defaults with every reboot.

item.title: CVE-2024-5411|2024-05-28T10:28:51.246Z -- oring -- iap-420
item.description: Missing input validation and OS command integration of the input in the ORing IAP-420 web-interface allows authenticated command injection.This issue affects IAP-420 version 2.01e and below.

item.title: CVE-2024-5410|2024-05-28T10:23:16.991Z -- oring -- iap-420
item.description: Missing input validation in the ORing IAP-420 web-interface allows stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).This issue affects IAP-420 version 2.01e and below.

item.title: CVE-2024-5411|2024-08-01T21:11:12.706Z -- oring -- iap-420
item.description: Missing input validation and OS command integration of the input in the ORing IAP-420 web-interface allows authenticated command injection.This issue affects IAP-420 version 2.01e and below.

item.title: CVE-2024-5410|2024-08-01T21:11:12.769Z -- oring -- iap-420
item.description: Missing input validation in the ORing IAP-420 web-interface allows stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).This issue affects IAP-420 version 2.01e and below.
